Bosses Overture.name: Tyrannical Predator
Bosses Overture.description: Tyrannical Predatoris aBossinLies of P, encountered in theOverture DLC.Tyrannical Predatoris a large crocodilian boss that uses its wide snout to attack players. Eliminating Bosses will usually cause them to drop rareErgo. The Ergo you obtain by defeating a boss is extremely valuable. Players will eventually be able to use these to exchange them for specialWeaponsandAmulets.

Bosses Overture.name: Markiona, Puppeteer of Death
Bosses Overture.description: Markiona, Puppeteer of Deathis aBossinLies of P, encountered in theOverture DLC. In the encounter withMarkiona, Puppeteer of Death, players will simultaneously fight theQueen's Arche Puppetalong withMarkiona. Eliminating Bosses will usually cause them to drop rareErgo. The Ergo you obtain by defeating a boss is extremely valuable. Players will eventually be able to use these to exchange them for specialWeaponsandAmulets.

Bosses Overture.name: Veronique, Leader of the Sweepers
Bosses Overture.description: Veronique, Leader of the Sweepersis aBossinLies of P, encountered in theOverture DLC.Veronique, Leader of the Sweeperswields a greathammer equipped with an engine, allowingVeroniqueto enhance her attacks with Fire.. Eliminating Bosses will usually cause them to drop rareErgo. The Ergo you obtain by defeating a boss is extremely valuable. Players will eventually be able to use these to exchange them for specialWeaponsandAmulets.

Bosses Overture.name: Two-faced Overseer
Bosses Overture.description: Two-faced Overseeris aBossinLies of P, encountered in theOverture DLC. TheTwo-faced Overseeris a battle-axe wielding boss that grows stronger as it becomes enraged. The player may use theDaylight-Wreathed Hornto summonthe Trackerto assist them in this fight.

Bosses Overture.name: Premetamorphic Green Hunter
Bosses Overture.description: Premetamorphic Green Hunteris a hidden optionalBossin theLies of P, encountered in theOverture DLC. ThePremetamorphic Green Hunteris an alien-like creature that uses tentacles, claws, and acid to attack and cause Decay build-up. Eliminating Bosses will usually cause them to drop rareErgo. The Ergo you obtain by defeating a boss is extremely valuable. Players will eventually be able to use these to exchange them for specialWeaponsandAmulets.

Bosses Overture.name: Anguished Guardian of the Ruins
Bosses Overture.description: Anguished Guardian of the Ruinsis aBossinLies of P, encountered in theOverture DLC. TheAnguished Guardian of the Ruinsis a massive humanoid boss, wielding a trident and a halberd. Eliminating Bosses will usually cause them to drop rareErgo. The Ergo you obtain by defeating a boss is extremely valuable. Players will eventually be able to use these to exchange them for specialWeaponsandAmulets.

Bosses Overture.name: Lumacchio, Leader of the Bastards
Bosses Overture.description: Lumacchio, Leader of the Bastardsis aBossinLies of P, encountered in theOverture DLC.Lumacchio, Leader of the Bastardsis a highly mobile boss who uses an umbrella in combat. Eliminating Bosses will usually cause them to drop rareErgo. The Ergo you obtain by defeating a boss is extremely valuable. Players will eventually be able to use these to exchange them for specialWeaponsandAmulets.

Bosses Overture.name: Arlecchino, the Blood Artist
Bosses Overture.description: Arlecchino the Blood Artistis aBossinLies of P.Arlecchino the Blood Artistserves as the final boss of theOverture DLC. In the boss fight withArlecchino, players will be fighting alongside Lea. Eliminating Bosses will usually cause them to drop rareErgo. The Ergo you obtain by defeating a boss is extremely valuable. Players will eventually be able to use these to exchange them for specialWeaponsandAmulets.

Bosses Main.name: Parade Master
Bosses Main.description: Parade Masteris aBossinLies of P. TheParade Masteris the first boss encountered inLies of Pand is located atKrat Central Station Plaza, blockingHotel Krat. TheParade Masteruses basic melee and charge attacks during the fight, using its head and hat as makeshift weapons. TheParade Masterdrops the Parade Leader's Ergo after being defeated.

Bosses Main.name: Scrapped Watchman
Bosses Main.description: Scrapped Watchmanis aBossinLies of P. The Krat City Hall's Watchman is found guarding the courtyard. His dialogue suggests that he is there to avenge his fallen friends, and his name is actually Murphy. He has Electric Shock emitting abilities that come from his overcharged storage battery. These abilities can be harnessed for yourself by obtaining the required part from him. Eliminating Bosses will usually cause them to drop rareErgo. The Ergo you obtain by defeating a boss is extremely valuable. Players will eventually be able to use these to exchange them for specialWeaponsandAmulets. Defeat him to gain the Scrapped WatchmanAchievement.

Bosses Main.name: King's Flame, Fuoco
Bosses Main.description: King's Flame, Fuocois aBossinLies of P. Like his name suggests theKing's Flamehas a set of abilities that can deal fire and cause players toOverheatwith his high-powered Flame Amplifier. He is encountered in the furnace room in the Center of Venigni Works. Throughout his encounter, he expresses his need for bigger flames and his loyalty to the king of puppets, Romeo, throughout the fight. Defeat him to obtain the King's Flameachievement. Eliminating Bosses will usually cause them to drop rareErgo. The Ergo you obtain by defeating a boss is extremely valuable. Players will eventually be able to use these to exchange them for specialWeaponsandAmulets.

Bosses Main.name: Fallen Archbishop Andreus
Bosses Main.description: Fallen Archbishop Andreusis aBossinLies of P.The Fallen Archbishopis the corrupted Bishop of St. Frangelico Cathedral, where everyone was afflicted or died with the disease. He gave into his greed and changed forms and now lives with the delusion that he is the chosen angel from god. Eliminating Bosses will usually cause them to drop rareErgo. The Ergo you obtain by defeating a boss is extremely valuable. Players will eventually be able to use these to exchange them for specialWeaponsandAmulets.

Bosses Main.name: Eldest of the Black Rabbit Brotherhood
Bosses Main.description: Eldest of the Black Rabbit Brotherhoodis aBossinLies of P. The Eldest is a part of theBlack Rabbit Brotherhood, which is a notorious criminal group of 4 Stalkers based in the Malum District. They torment the residents of their neighborhood. Eliminating Bosses will usually cause them to drop rareErgo. The Ergo you obtain by defeating a boss is extremely valuable. Players will eventually be able to use these to exchange them for specialWeaponsandAmulets. Clear this boss battle to gain theAchievement:The Delayed Match.

Bosses Main.name: King of Puppets
Bosses Main.description: King of Puppetsis aBossinLies of P.King of Puppetsis encountered in the Estella Opera House Stage enjoying a stageplay. He appears to attempt to reason with P unbeknownst to him. His encounter is followed by another boss battle against his other form,Romeo, King of Puppets. Eliminating Bosses will usually cause them to drop rareErgo. The Ergo you obtain by defeating a boss is extremely valuable. Players will eventually be able to use these to exchange them for specialWeaponsandAmulets.

Bosses Main.name: Romeo, King of Puppets
Bosses Main.description: Romeo, King of Puppetsis aBossinLies of P.Romeo, King of Puppetsis the human form of theKing of Puppetsand appears as the second part of the boss fight. According to his dialogue, he holds memories of a dear friend called Carlo. Eliminating Bosses will usually cause them to drop rareErgo. The Ergo you obtain by defeating a boss is extremely valuable. Players will eventually be able to use these to exchange them for specialWeaponsandAmulets.

Bosses Main.name: Champion Victor
Bosses Main.description: Champion Victoris aBossinLies of P.Champion Victoris a champion of the Alchemist led partially by Simon Manus. Eliminating Bosses will usually cause them to drop rareErgo. The Ergo you obtain by defeating a boss is extremely valuable. Players will eventually be able to use these to exchange them for specialWeaponsandAmulets.

Bosses Main.name: Green Monster of the Swamp
Bosses Main.description: Green Monster of the Swampis aBossinLies of P.Green Monster of the Swampis the Monster that occupies the Barren Swamp said to have been made by the Alchemists. According to the Sentry's notebook, it obsessively protects its nest and likes to bring its toys there, and sucks Ergo from scrapped puppets. The Green Monster of the Swamp is the first phase of its form before it merges with puppet parts and turns into thePuppet-Devouring Green Monster. Eliminating Bosses will usually cause them to drop rareErgo. The Ergo you obtain by defeating a boss is extremely valuable. Players will eventually be able to use these to exchange them for specialWeaponsandAmulets.

Bosses Main.name: Puppet-Devouring Green Monster
Bosses Main.description: Puppet-Devouring Green Monsteris aBossinLies of P.Puppet-Devouring Green Monsteris the Monster that occupies the Barren Swamp said to have been made by the Alchemists. It is the second phase of theGreen Monster of the Swampafter it infuses itself with some nearby puppet parts. According to the Sentry's notebook, it obsessively protects its nest and likes to bring its toys there, and sucks Ergo from scrapped puppets. Eliminating Bosses will usually cause them to drop rareErgo. The Ergo you obtain by defeating a boss is extremely valuable. Players will eventually be able to use these to exchange them for specialWeaponsandAmulets.

Bosses Main.name: Corrupted Parade Master
Bosses Main.description: Corrupted Parade Masteris aBossinLies of P. TheCorrupted Parade Masteris the corrupted version of theParade Master, and it can spreadDecayin this form. Although theCorrupted Parade Masteris physically different from theParade Master, it retains some of its attacks. TheCorrupted Parade Masteris a Carcass, which means that it is vulnerable to Fire damage and Electric Blitz.

Bosses Main.name: Black Rabbit Brotherhood
Bosses Main.description: Black Rabbit Brotherhoodis aBossinLies of P. TheBlack Rabbit Brotherhoodis a notorious criminal group of 4 Stalkers based in the Malum District, but are later encountered again underground after defeating theEldest of the Black Rabbit Brotherhood. The other three members include the Battle Maniac, Eccentric, and the Youngest. Defeat the Black Rabbit Brotherhood in the Relic of Trismegistus to gain theAchievement:Revenge of the Black.This page will cover strategies for the second (2nd) encounter of this boss fight, the first encounter guide can be foundhere.

Bosses Main.name: Laxasia the Complete
Bosses Main.description: Laxasia the Completeis aBossinLies of P.Laxasia the Complete'sloyalty lies with Sir Manus and stands in the way of you and the tower.Laxasia the Completeis extremely vulnerable to Acid damage, so it is recommended to use weapons that inflict Acid damage, such as theAcidic Crystal Spear Blade, or even consumables such asAcid Abrasive.Laxasiawill be encountered near theArche Abbey Prayer RoomStargazer.

Bosses Main.name: Simon Manus, Awakened God
Bosses Main.location: Arche Abbey Cradle of the Gods
Bosses Main.description: Simon Manus (Arm of God in 1st phase, Awakened God in 2nd phase)is aBossinLies of P.Simon Manus, Awakened Godis the awakened version and the second phase ofSimon Manus, Arm of Godand the ascended form of the NPC,Simon Manus, one of the leaders of the Alchemists. Eliminating Bosses will usually cause them to drop rareErgo. The Ergo you obtain by defeating a boss is extremely valuable. Players will eventually be able to use these to exchange them for specialWeaponsandAmulets.

Bosses Main.name: Nameless Puppet
Bosses Main.description: Nameless Puppetis aBossinLies of P.Nameless Puppetis one of Geppetto's creations and the last onePwill face.Geppettouses the Nameless Puppet to punish P for his mischievous ways. Defeating theNameless Puppetwill give the player theNameless Puppet's Ergo. TheNameless Puppetis extremely weak against Electric Blitz, and weak against Acid, so it is recommended to use equipment that deals Electric Blitz damage. Defeating the Nameless Puppet earns you theAchievement:The First Puppet.

Minibosses.name: Mad Donkey
Minibosses.description: Mad Donkeyis aBossinLies of P. The Mad Donkey is a Boss in a humanoid form with a Donkey mask, giving it its name. TheMad Donkeywields a long Great Saw, used for hunting. He appears to hold a grudge against all puppets and their puppet maker, and his thirst for truth brings out his violent and stubborn nature despite all the dangers he faces. Eliminating Bosses will usually cause them to drop rareErgo. The Ergo you obtain by defeating a boss is extremely valuable. Players will eventually be able to use these to exchange them for specialWeaponsandAmulets.

Minibosses.name: Puppet of the Future
Minibosses.description: Puppet of the Futureis aBossinLies of P. Puppet of the Future is an optional mini-boss puppet made of metal parts located on the lower floors of the Workshop Union Culvert. An iconic feature of the puppet is its long weighted arms that are able to support the whole puppet. Eliminating Bosses will usually cause them to drop rareErgo. The Ergo you obtain by defeating a boss is extremely valuable. Players will eventually be able to use these to exchange them for specialWeaponsandAmulets. Mini-bosses will not drop unique Ergo, but you will still be able to gain valuable loot.

Minibosses.name: Survivor
Minibosses.location: Workshop Union Culvert - Venigni Works Control Room
Minibosses.description: Survivoris aBossinLies of P. The Survivor is a mini-boss that is a part of the Stalkers. The Survivor wears a mouse mask indicating that he is a Rookie Stalker. Rookie Stalkers usually wear the animal masks decided by superiors. Wear theBlue Blood's Tailcoatoutfit to trigger dialogue that suggests he is guilt-ridden for abandoning his friend, Leo, and laments breaking his vow. Eliminating regualar Bosses will usually cause them to drop rareErgo. The Ergo you obtain by defeating a boss is extremely valuable. Players will eventually be able to use these to exchange them for specialWeaponsandAmulets. SeeSurvivor (NPC)page for additional NPC information.

Minibosses.name: The Atoned
Minibosses.description: The Atonedis aBossinLies of P. The Atoned is a mini-boss that wears an old dog mask as a part of theStalkers. She stands in the way of the Pilgrim's Cable Railway that takes you to the Path of Misery, which leads to the St. Frangelico Cathedral, to prevent people from traveling there, even if that means attacking them. She warns that there is terror above. Eliminating main Bosses will usually cause them to drop rareErgo. The Ergo you obtain by defeating a boss is extremely valuable. Players will eventually be able to use these to exchange them for specialWeaponsandAmulets. SeeThe Atoned (NPC)page for additionalNPCinformation.

Minibosses.name: White Lady
Minibosses.description: White Ladyis aBossinLies of P. TheWhite Ladyis a mini-boss who wears a pigeon mask. She became a Stalker instead of continuing to pursue her dreams as an opera singer. She is also known as Patricia, a musician as part of a performing duo along with her sister,Adelina, the primadonna singer in the red dress. She now seeks to avenge her sister by eliminating puppets who took her. Eliminating Bosses will usually cause them to drop rareErgo. The Ergo you obtain by defeating a boss is extremely valuable. Players will eventually be able to use these to exchange them for specialWeaponsandAmulets. SeeWhite Lady (NPC)page for additionalNPCinformation.

Minibosses.name: Mad Clown Puppet
Minibosses.description: Mad Clown Puppetis aMini-BossinLies of P. TheMad Clown Puppetcan be seen patrolling inRosa Isabelle Street Culvertright before theEstella Opera Houseand can be fought when approached. TheMad Clown Puppetis weak to Fire damage and Electric Blitz, so it is recommended to use weapons that inflict those damage types when fighting theMad Clown Puppet.

Minibosses.name: Owl Doctor
Minibosses.description: Owl Doctoris aBossinLies of P.Owl Doctoris one of the Stalker mini-bosses with a mask of an Owl. The Alchemists' merciless experiments pushed him to his limit. In his pain, he denied reality and escaped into delusion. Eliminating Bosses will usually cause them to drop rareErgo. The Ergo you obtain by defeating a boss is extremely valuable. Players will eventually be able to use these to exchange them for specialWeaponsandAmulets.

Minibosses.name: Walker of Illusions
rewards: Dark moon Moonstone of the Covenant
Minibosses.description: Walker of Illusionsis aBossinLies of P.Walker of Illusionsis one of the mini-bosses found at the top of the Collapsed Workshop Tower on Collapsed Street, and the player will face her after climbing the ladder to the top. TheWalker of Illusionsis weak against Fire, so the player can use weapons and consumables that deal Fire damage to it. TheWalker of Illusionsdrops theLegion Caliberand theDark Moon Moonstone of the Covenantupon defeat.

Minibosses.name: Door Guardian
Minibosses.description: Door Guardianis aBossinLies of P.Door Guardianis the Guard and a high-level Alchemist mini-boss atArche Abbey. TheDoor Guardianholds the Key to the mysterious door. Eliminating Bosses will usually cause them to drop rareErgo. The Ergo you obtain by defeating a boss is extremely valuable. Players will eventually be able to use these to exchange them for specialWeaponsandAmulets.

Minibosses.name: Robber Weasel
Minibosses.description: Wobber Weaselis aBossinLies of P. Wobber Weaselis a Mini-Boss that wields a small axe and wears a Weasel animal mask, a common feature of the Stalkers. Eliminating Bosses will usually cause them to drop rareErgo. The Ergo you obtain by defeating a boss is extremely valuable. Players will eventually be able to use these to exchange them for specialWeaponsandAmulets.

Minibosses.name: Red Fox (Boss)
Minibosses.description: Red Fox (Boss)is aBossinLies of P.Red Fox (Boss)is one of the Stalkers seen throughout the game in various locations commonly seen withBlack Cat, her brother. She is a generally amicableNPCwho is involved in other questlines, but players will have the option to battle her as a mini-boss later in the game. If you choose to show her kindness, she later introduces herself as Claudia. Eliminating Bosses will usually cause them to drop rareErgo. The Ergo you obtain by defeating a boss is extremely valuable. Players will eventually be able to use these to exchange them for specialWeaponsandAmulets. See theRed FoxNPC page for additionalNPCand quest information.

Minibosses.name: Black Cat (Boss)
Minibosses.description: Black Cat (Boss)is aBossinLies of P.Black Cat (Boss)is one of the Stalkers seen throughout the game in various locations withRed Fox, his sister, as a generally amicableNPC, but players will have the option to fight him. When he requests for a Gold Coin Fruit, you can give it to him or refuse to initiate the battle. He wields aCity Longspearin battle. See theBlack CatNPC page for additionalNPCand quest information.Note that fighting the Black Cat for hisBlack Cat's Maskis not mandatory.
